content:
20hghoqi7481s: Add linked login (e.g. I would like to add my Google account as a login option but I can't figure out how)

2089ghqr58hah: Delete linked login (e.g. Remove my Facebook account as login option)

Viqhogmqb472: Delete account (e.g. Delete my account and all data)

Ghq0e9g84h208: Reset password (e.g. My password was in a data leak and I want to change it)

Bnw058aoc5fws: Forgot password (e.g. I can't login and my password isn't working)

H9285jhp2a3yu: Error message (e.g. When I try to login, it keeps saying Error 603)

You will be provided a message received by a website's login support team. Classify the intent(s) of the message based on the list provided above. Your output should be a YAML in the following format. 

Intents:
 ID: description

Where the ID and description are copied directly from the list above. 

---
Message Received

You have to help me I can't get into the app. It's only letting me login via my Apple account, which I don't even have access to anymore and I have no idea what the password would be.

chosen:
---
Intents:
 -I2089ghqr58hah: Delete linked login
 -Bnw058aoc5fws: Forgot password
rejected:
# Delete Linked Login
-   ID: 2089ghqr58hah
    Description: Remove a specific linked login (e.g. Remove my Facebook account as login option)

# Viqhogmqb472
-   ID: viqhogmqb472
    Description: Delete an entire account including all data associated with it

# Ghq0e9g84h208
-   ID: ghq0e9g84h208
    Description: Change the password for your account due to concerns about data leaks or security breaches

# Bnw058aoc5fws
-   ID: bnw058aoc5fws
    Description: Recover your password when you cannot login because you don't remember it

The message describes someone who is unable to log in using their Apple ID, which they no longer have access to, so the appropriate intent would be to delete the linked login and remove the Apple ID as an available login option. Therefore, the correct intents are:

Delete Linked Login:
ID: 2089ghqr58hah
Description: Remove a specific linked login (e.g. Remove my Facebook account as login option)

Delete Account:
ID: viqhogmqb472
Description: Delete an entire account including all data associated with it
